message: I've always liked the idea of apetheism which was introduced in an article years ago in Harpers (I think). Apetheism is a theological position in which you admit that maybe there's a god and maybe there isn't, but in either case it doesn't make a lot of difference in how you conduct your life. Apetheism: from theism (a belief that god may exist) + apethetic (as in """"who cares"""").

message: Nick Fury was white in the comics yet portrayed by Samuel L Jackson. Halfway through filming the HP series a white actor was stabbed and killed and the role was recast with a black actor. Get over it. In the original script for the Matrix Neo was black and his mentor white and they flipped it when they couldn't get Will Smith and Sean Connery. They cast blondes instead of brunettes and vice versa... whatever. Physical appearance isn't everything.
